TopicTitle: Dark Multiplayer: Interplanetary Warfare Server! (Sandbox + Career)

Articles.Content:
What is this?

Well, essentially, this is a server for the mod called "Dark Multiplayer" which allows players to play together in KSP on servers.

You can build space stations together with friends, you can do aerobatics, you can fight each other, and do so much more with this mod.

The rules are simple for this server. You can join together with friends in your own faction, or go solo and handle your own force.

All you need is just a unique color for you or your faction, a simple idea on how to manage an effective military, and some diplomacy skills!

You don't just hop on and fight everything in sight. You make allies, declare war, and even perform scientific operations with neighbors.

This isn't your average war server, you practically are controlling a nation which can claim small plots of territory, negotiate, fight, and do many more things.

Will you destroy the Kerbol system, or will you unite it? You decide as you and your allies fly into victory or defeat!

Rules

The rules are somewhat simple:

1. **All** crafts must be labeled before the name to ensure that a, for example, satellite would be yours and not the next guy's. *(Example: KSS Eximpru; KSS Omega; FS Otsu; SOMA Doqon)*
2. No cheats or hyper-edit. We know when a player hyper-edits. Cheaters will be **kicked.**
3. Factions that do not want participate in any and all wars must have this label before their craft: PF-(faction label). *(Example: PF-KSS Eximpru; PF-KSS Omega; PF-FS Otsu; PF-SOMA Doqon)*
4. The only way to claim territory is have a central base, claiming an area of **5km** around it. No defenses may be built **outside** of this **5km** zone, but any extra bases outside of this zone have a **2km** radius around them.
5. The maximum area allowed for one base is **10km**, and the maximum number of bases for one faction is **10 bases**.
6. Destroying an enemy vehicle without a declaration of war is automatically a declaration of war.

 May the greatest faction win!

If you wish to contact me for any reason relating to the server, my Skype is lolcatzco.

I will likely appear as Techiastronamo in Skype. 

My steam is Techiastronamo as well if you want to contact me that way.

Server Info

**Sandbox Mode Server**

IP: 158.69.139.112 

Port: 6702

Maximum Players: 30

***Online***

**Career Mode Server**

IP:158.69.139.112

Port: 6703

Maximum Players: 30

***Online***

**Hardcore Server**

IP:158.69.139.112

Port: 6704

Maximum Players: 30

***Online***

**Required Mods:**

1) BDArmory: **** [**http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-%28critical-fixes-improved-AI%29-Dev-Thread-May-30**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-%28critical-fixes-improved-AI%29-Dev-Thread-May-30) **** ***Download latest version of BDArmory.***

2) BDArmory DMP Plugin: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130464-WIP-1-0-4-BDArmoury-DMP-Add-on](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130464-WIP-1-0-4-BDArmoury-DMP-Add-on) ***Download the BDDMP, replacing any and all files.***

***For those moderators who don't know, yes, I did get permission to have both links up there from the developers of the mods***

3) Firespitter

4) KAX

5) Alcubierre Warp Drive ***Hardcore server only, incompatible with other servers!*** *NOTICE: NOT YET IMPLEMENTED*

6) Ferram Aerospace Research ***Hardcore server only, incompatible with other servers!***
